snippet: THE Metropolitan Opera Association throws open the doors  of its renovated and newly purchased theatre tomorrow night for its season of 1940-41, under conditions more favorable for its activities than it has known in many years....

headline.main: LOOKING TOWARD A NEW YEAR; As the Metropolitan Prepares to Open Its Season With a Revival Of Verdi's 'Masked Ball'--Other Prospects

lead_paragraph: THE Metropolitan Opera Association throws open the doors of its renovated and newly purchased theatre tomorrow night for its season of 1940-41, under conditions more favorable for its activities than it has known in many years.
